com.jp.stocks.dao

Interface TradeDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TradeDaoImpl

    public interface TradeDao
    This is persistence class for the given instrument. The implementors of these shall consider whether to store in filesystem, Database or keep them in memory. This can be extended to any type of financial instrument

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean deleteTrade(Trade trade)
      Delete a given trade
      List<Trade> getAllTrades()
      Returns all trades for all instruments
      List<Trade> getVwapTrades(String symbol, int elapsedTime)
      Returns trades for a given instrument
      boolean saveTrade(Trade trade)
      Persists a given instrument

    • Method Detail

      • saveTrade

        boolean saveTrade(Trade trade)
           throws DaoException
        Persists a given instrument
        Parameters:
        trade - trade to save
        Returns:
        boolean if saved successfully
        Throws:
        DaoException - in case of any connection issues or cache issues (if it is stored in memory)

      • deleteTrade

        boolean deleteTrade(Trade trade)
             throws DaoException,
                    InstrumentNotFoundException
        Delete a given trade
        Parameters:
        trade - trade to delete
        Returns:
        boolean if removed successfully
        Throws:
        DaoException - in case of any connection issues or cache issues (if it is stored in memory)
        InstrumentNotFoundException - if the given trade is not found

      • getVwapTrades

        List<Trade> getVwapTrades(String symbol,
                          int elapsedTime)
                   throws DaoException
        Returns trades for a given instrument
        Parameters:
        symbol - trades to retrieve for a symbol
        elapsedTime - elapsed time for the trade to be retrieved
        Returns:
        List of trades
        Throws:
        DaoException - in case of any connection issues or cache issues (if it is stored in memory)

      • getAllTrades

        List<Trade> getAllTrades()
                  throws DaoException
        Returns all trades for all instruments
        Returns:
        List of trades
        Throws:
        DaoException - in case of any connection issues or cache issues (if it is stored in memory)
